website_summaries.verdict: This razor will offer you a smooth finish, but you need to keep it plugged in and ready to go, as the charge won't last long.
pros: It's safe for teens/new shavers, as there's no pulling or cutting, and it's easy to clean and maneuver
cons: The charge doesn't last long, and it's easily broken

customer_reviews.title: It's a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This razor is absolutely the most underwhelming piece of junk I've ever tried to use. You would get a quicker, better more complete shave using a butter knife. The motor is so weak that it stalls out when it hits a hair more than 1/16th long. The battery dies before you can get even one half of an ankle shaved. Pure and total junk. I returned the first one thinking I just got a dud, but the replacement was even more anemic. I would feel comfortable letting a 3 year old play with it as I know they couldn't hurt themself nor cut any hair.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Charging stand doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't give a smooth shave, but it was great for those rushed mornings where I wanted to get the 'visible' hair off my legs. The trimmer worked great on personal areas. I was very disappointed when after only a year of occasional use and gentle care, the charger stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Alysen

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to Get a Clean Shave
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a thorough shaving electric razor as it even says in the directions in the packaging. You have to go over & over the area you're trying to shave, causing razor burns. Sometimes, the razor foils catch your skin also, causing cuts. I bought it for my bikini line and wish it would provide a smooth, painless shave. It requires the same effort on my legs & underarms. It's not a good women's electric shaver.
customer_reviews.author: LABookLover

customer_reviews.title: Not a Yeti anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought this electric razor based on several suggestions. I find I have less desire to rid my legs of hair during the brutal winter months and needed something to help me not look like the yeti roaming my neighborhood. This razor does not disappoint. Their are no more Yeti sighting long in my hood.
customer_reviews.author: LennyMak

customer_reviews.title: Still Searching For A Decent Razor...
customer_reviews.text: I really was hoping this would be the last razor I would have to buy, but it looks like that is not going to be :-( I've been on a search for an electric razor for a woman that works on all her delicate parts without razor burn, pain, cuts, tugging and pulling and I have yet to find one. The Conair Satiny Smooth unfortunately, for me, caused minor cuts and abrasions. It was not effective at all in getting rid of the very fair, fine hair on my legs and just basically overall did not do much of anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Ok shaving power
customer_reviews.text: Ok shaving power but my favorite features are the PRICE and having a CORD on the cradle. I've had another cheap shaver that made you put the shaver on a base that plugs directly in the wall and it was always a struggle to find an upright available plugin with enough clearance when traveling. I docked one star because the shaver screen in is very delicate and I've already cracked the plastic. I was able to super-glue it back together but be aware that it won't take a beating. Also, I don't have particularly coarse hair so some might not find it powerful enough.
customer_reviews.author: B. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: This razor is the best. I have even tried to use their other ...
customer_reviews.text: This razor is the best. I have even tried to use their other products, but this particular design works best. the dual foil heads don't scratch me or pull at my hair and the extra little trimmer doesn't pull either. I tried using another one, used it ONCE before I ordered this one to get back to the kind I use.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Brown

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this same shaver for about 8 years. It used to be sold at Walmart but now I can only find it here on Amazon. It lasts about 2 years with constant use, just be sure to follow the proper charging protocol. I left it plugged in for a full day before and it messed up the internal battery (like a laptop battery).
customer_reviews.author: ShiShi

customer_reviews.title: Bought cheap and got cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to charge for 16 hours before 1st use. Seemed to work fine. The directions said I should let the battery go completely dead at least every 3 months so I did. Put it on the charger and the green charging light came on. I let it charge for 2 days and it will not come on at all. It is out of replacement eligibility with Amazon, so I called Conair. They say it has a 2 year warranty, but want a receipt. Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Paula St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: Bad razor
customer_reviews.text: when you take head off to clean the 4 springs go flying. I never found one of them. Razor didn't last but a few months before it died for good
customer_reviews.author: barbdwire

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The last one I had was my absolute favorite so I was a little nervous on buying this one but it works just as good as the one that was 10 years older
customer_reviews.author: CASSANDRA READ

customer_reviews.title: Help need springs!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shaver, but I've had it last than a month and the foil broke apart this morning while removing it for cleaning. The tiny springs under the cutters went down the drain in the sink. How can I get springs. What size are they???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself is great. Holds up in the shower, is easy to hold and easy to charge. The charging stand is great. It trims hair great. However it will not shave close to the leg. It leaves a stubble. I cannot figure out how to make this better.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Owen Stuwe

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shaver for many years and it's no longer available at Target or Walgreens where I've bought at least two. They last about two years and for $20 it's a steel. Shaves great, no stubble or pain, recharges great for as long as I can keep it from falling apart from dropping it in the shower. It's wet/dry so I use the wet feature and unfortunately it gets dropped a few times. Maybe I'll wrap it in rubber bands to give it some shock protection while keeping it held together when I inevitably drop it. I've paid much more for inferior models.
customer_reviews.author: Lougallops

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product at first, it worked well. It shaves pretty close for electric and it never once pinched or scratched my skin. But the battery life started to decrease after about two months. It slowly started to hold less and less of a charge. Eventually I was leaving it on the charger all the time and it wouldn't even make it through one full shave. This product lasted about 7 months for me before I had to replace it, which given the low price isn't terrible. But I wish I had just spent five to ten dollars more to get a product that would have been less of a hassle and lasted at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jess F

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last long. It couldn't decide if it wanted to work or not. The shave wasn't very smooth, either. Used on legs and crotch, eventually replaced with a Panasonic. Put your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley L Chamblee

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I could get more use in a schick razor .This thing I used 2 times and it was useless after that . for me its No . I would not buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Siwara

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It makes shaving so easy and neat!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I was aware of this product long before. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: light

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it for the first month. I went on vacation for a week and a half and it wouldn't charge after I returned. I left it unplugged for the time I was gone but when I re connected the stand it wouldn't charge I can't get the thing to power on.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but does a decent job...
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, but feels kind of cheap. It takes a long time going over one spot to finally get a "smooth" finish. I had a Remington previously that did a much better job in a faster amount of time. I didn't even finish shaving and the batter died on this one... And it constantly feels like it's scraping across the skin. I'm sure that wouldn't happen if I wasn't pressing hard, but if you don't press hard, you won't get a very smooth shave. All in all, it's okay. I definitely wish there was a better option though.
customer_reviews.author: BGG

customer_reviews.title: ... prior to purchasing this one and it was much better quality. New one does not preform well
customer_reviews.text: I had a Conair prior to purchasing this one and it was much better quality. New one does not preform well. Doesn't cut hairs on legs well (need to press very hard to make it work). Quality is cheap and it needs to be recharged every few days. Not happy with this product. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sharongaudette

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this product, but it is very cheaply made. Returned. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mouser

customer_reviews.title: Totally love this shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaver! I love the foil option. It gives a nice clean shave. It cleans easily. I opted to buy an additional head because I don't want to get caught without using it, should something happen. It holds a good charge; in fact, with daily usage I only charge it once a week. What more can I say...it's just what I needed! Thanks Conair!
customer_reviews.author: Belva G. Prine

customer_reviews.title: Best Wet/Dry shaver I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Conair Wet/Dry shaver that I have bought. The first one lasted about six years, then the battery finally died. I could not find this shaver in the stores, so I purchased a Remington wet/dry shaver at a big-box store, and that is a piece of junk; it would not shave anything at all. With this shaver, it shaves the hair very easily and for me does not cause any irritation. The shaver stays charged long enough too. Now one thing to remember, an electric shaver will not get your as silky as a razor, but this does the job when I need a quick touch up.
customer_reviews.author: Rah-Rah

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shaver. I didn't realize my last one was so bad until I saw the job this one did! No pulling, quick cut, and it looks good too! I haven't used it in the shower so I can't review that feature.
customer_reviews.author: HonestAbe

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't to sure how this would work for me, I have a lot of health issues and can't shave like I used to so I thought I would give this a try for the price it was worth checking out. I'm so happy that I did it works great and I love it! Just used it today for the first time and was amazed at how well it worked and it wasn't to hard to hold onto. Just make sure that it's charged up the first time you go to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: Decent shave but cheaply made. 2nd time I went to take the foil off to blow out the shaver blades the tiny arms that hold it on broke off. Spring went flying. Not happy. It's pretty much useless now. Tried to use tape to keep it on. No thank you. I'll go back to the Remington I had before.
customer_reviews.author: C. Close

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I stopped making my own sugar wax. Just needed a break. I didn't want to buy disposable razors anymore, so this was a great option. I use it dry, about once a week and it works great. I charge it up the day before I need to use it and it works smoothly and comfortably. The compact size is easy to store and it's very quiet as well.
customer_reviews.author: carzmom

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for summer and use a conair shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I love conair shavers! I've tried different models of other shavers! And I find Conair is always the brand I go back to! You can shave your arms you can shave your legs and your bikini area without any problems! A great product!
customer_reviews.author: jeanette Grantham

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The directions say to use it 12 times before deciding what you think of it. My thoughts only got worse - It seems to be working way worse than it did at first and has become pretty useless. Definitely not worth the price as it's faster and more effective to just dry shave with a razor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 11 year old daughter. She does have sort of hairy legs, and all summer has been insisting that she be allowed to shave. I don't really want her using a razor blade, I don't want her to cut herself and I also don't want to give her an excuse to hog up more time in the bathroom - yikes. It arrived yesterday, she fully charged it last night and has now shaved all 4 ladies in this house. I gotta say it does a nice job even in the hand of a novice.
customer_reviews.author: Almeeker

customer_reviews.title: The design was not appealing to me.
customer_reviews.text: This item was returned. I did not care for he “slanty” design.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Eyre

customer_reviews.title: poor design
customer_reviews.text: The design of the razor's shape is ackward to shave with. The design of this razor's charging holder is not good either. The razor is easily knocked off it's base. The razor is easy to clean. I have used mine approximately one year. I recently took off the top for cleaning and it fell apart and it cannot be put together again. I have used it approx. 12-15 times. It is out of warranty, so no replacement for me. I will not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: SueB

customer_reviews.title: Razor stubble and weak motor
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is not very strong, which means you have to go over an area again and again to remove hair. It also causes razor stubble :-( Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working after only 5 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought and received this product on July 1, 2017. After only 5 months, the hair dryer is not working properly and it even sparked when I was drying my 8 year old daughter's hair. Scary. It said the return window closed on July 31, 2017. A hair dryer should work more than 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: J. Macgregor

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone. I had one for many years worked perfect. This one broke with in three days of having it and it left little scratches on my legs. I would save my money
customer_reviews.author: Ginna Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: it cut me so bad I bled. it is very unsafe
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin, this is a bad shaver. No matter how softly I let it touch my skin it scratched my legs. Edit: well now I realize that it really did remove any hair for all the scratches. I will be returning it. As far as the packaging, 1 star. I have a cut on my finger because the clam-shell packaging, I almost broke my scissors trying to open it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Slane

customer_reviews.title: BEST ELECTRIC SHAVER
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great electric shaver. It gives a close shave and does not take a lot of time. I have the option of using anywhere that is convenient for me - in or out of the shower. I stand behind it - I not only recommend its purchase, I would gladly give it as a requested gift.
customer_reviews.author: T. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shaver Ever
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst shaver I have ever used. It doesn't hold charge for very long, does not do an adequate job shaving legs and seems underpowered. Do NOT waste your money on this piece of trash!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Too close for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for, like with this razor. I've used it just a few times before it dawned on me that the roughness of the blades was leaving my skin irritated. On a doctor's visit today I was told to stop using this razor because the leg irritation was caused by the razor. Also, it doesn't seat well into the charger and is easily dislodged, and there is enough of a light coming from the LED charger light that you wouldn't want it near your sleep area.
customer_reviews.author: A Dogged shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not a close shave
customer_reviews.text: It does not give me a close shave. To get the hair off I have to go back and forth over the area several times. This may just be my experience. I was really hoping it would work like a blade razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Celarek

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery - less than 2 months old
customer_reviews.text: Had this less than 2 months and the battery is completely dead. Any tips/hints would be appreciated, but really sad, it worked awesome until this.
customer_reviews.author: ktmb

customer_reviews.title: This was a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was birthday gift for one of my family members. I don't know anything other than it came a day or two earlier than was scheduled and my family member seemed to like it when she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Reetz

customer_reviews.title: Bikini trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in 2017 It has held up well Challenge to clean I use keyboard air cleaner then rinse
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: not too happy
customer_reviews.text: this one was cheaply made. I bought it to replace one that I had used for at least 20 years or more. The first time that I used this one and took the shield off to brush the hair out, the shield broke in my hand. It was more bother than it was worth during a very busy time to return it but it has soured me on this brand. Just beware.
customer_reviews.author: C. Louthain

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward shaver! It also does not cut the hair as close as I like, leaving stubble that is about as long as if I used a razor the day before. I like a VERY close shave, so I very seldom use this. I have given up with the electric razors and with only having a shower in my new apartment instead of a bathtub, I've gone to just using Nair.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: OK Razor
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and this seemed a good choice. I needed a razor mostly for legs. The other reviewers suggest a light touch and that is really true on underarms. Push too hard and you will have some scrapes! It works pretty well with no razor burn on legs, though, just what I needed. I like the choice of wet or dry and it holds a charge for a long time. It's good to see extra heads available online too.
customer_reviews.author: ANNYOAKLE

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor as a beginner for my 10 year old daughter. She loves it and is really good with using it on her own. Was a great value for the money and have not had any problems with it thus far. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: There is no trim blade to trim hair before shaving.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shaver OK but wish Conair still sold the old green ones. They were the best. This new one is hard to shave in private places and you cannot get too close.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Otte

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Conair
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several shavers since my last Conair died after many, many years. None of them worked very well, until I decided to order a Conair online. Love my new Conair. I will never buy another brand of women's shavers but Conair!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Billie A. Rosen

customer_reviews.title: My mother was very happy with her old model was hung around the house ...
customer_reviews.text: My mother was very happy with her old model was hung around the house for a decade. We figured the charging base died, and a replacement charging base was almost as much as we paid for a new item. Conair makes great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Burton

customer_reviews.title: My old one quite working, I bought it in ...
customer_reviews.text: My old one quite working, I bought it in 1988. Hope this one lasts as long. If it does it will outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bug it
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart quickly. Teeth fall out resulting in skin scratches and cuts
customer_reviews.author: Bj$

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bad shaver. I think I was able to use it 2 times before it started pulling my hair and dying after being used for about 30 seconds. I did store it on the charger so it would be fully charged, but it was pretty much a hunk of junk from the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: GotCats?

customer_reviews.title: "yanked" out facial hair
customer_reviews.text: first battery shaver that "yanked" hair out of my delicate facial skin! Left my face sore for days. Have done so w/other shavers for years, and never had that experience before. Will return to using my 2 older Remington shavers, which were much more expensive than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Great  Grandmom

customer_reviews.title: This is the 7th one I have owned. Be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 7th one I have owned. Be fore warned, they last about six months, then the battery won't hold a charge. While they are working propery they give a decent shave for an inexpensive razor. But when they start having battery problems they stop working very quickly..So be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't start using this until recently. Stopped working after ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't start using this until recently. Stopped working after a couple of weeks, thought it just needed to be charged. Placed in charger but wouldn't charge. Too late to return, threw it out. Maybe I just got a dud but be sure to use it right away so you can return if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Souza

customer_reviews.title: Working out  well
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this is safe both in the shower and not. I have not had it long but the battery seems to be holding well. My only downside is the two side trimmers that don't appear to detach and if not careful can abrade skin if not angled correctly. The plus on that is you don't have to hunt down the trimmer attachment if you want to trim longer hair.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to use! Since I am use to using a razor I still need to get a bit more practice with this unit, but so far I love it. I am on oxygen so shaving my legs is a hassle, but with the Satiny Smooth by Conair Dual Foil Wet/Dry Razor it is much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It should shave closer as it says and doesn't not really to happy but what to do
customer_reviews.text: Not working as well as it says only runs for 30minutes and has to charge for 16 hrs, what is wrong with this picture. It should shave closer as it says and doesn't not really to happy but what to do.
customer_reviews.author: debra hutson

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Charge doesn't last as long as I'd like for it to, but a really good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my mother to replace the one she has had sense the early 2000s. When I revived the product the plastic cover was cracked, the foil was cracked and the product did not hold charge.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Young

customer_reviews.title: I love this razor
customer_reviews.text: I personally do NOT have tons of hair on my legs etc. So this works perfect for me. I can't tell whether or how it would work on others. Postmenopausal here and the shave works great. I hate using razors because I cut myself...and frankly...pain in the butt for having light fine hair on my legs..this was the best solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: smileznhugz

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick touch up and even better for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick touch up and even better for arms. I had lung surgery and they shaved my arms as part of the prep. I never thought about shaving arms but now it's a must!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Jaust

customer_reviews.title: Good shaver
customer_reviews.text: My favorite electric shaver! It's my second purchase of this one after the first died. Had the first one for quite a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: not breaking
customer_reviews.text: I used it and it did fine. The first time I tryed to clean it. I pulled the head off and it broke. i am very disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good razor
customer_reviews.text: I like this razor, it is best for your legs, left my underarms with razor burn. I deducted a star because it fits at an odd angle into the charger. I broke at least one razor when it fell from charger to floor. I keep it far back on counter now, so when, not if, it falls from charger, it lands on counter, not floor.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Turnbough

customer_reviews.title: probably not a terrible deal.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well when I used it, only about once a month, but now it's only been a little over a year since I bought it and it no longer holds a charge rendering it unusable...... will be looking for something else to replace it, though for the price, probably not a terrible deal.
customer_reviews.author: MARY JO HUTCHINSON

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this. Did not shave close and pulled hair on legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR FACIAL AREA.
customer_reviews.text: I USED IT TO SHAVE MY LEGS AND UNDERARMS AND IT WORKED WELL. BUT WHEN I TRIED TO SHAVE MY CHIN AREA IT IRRITATED MY SKIN AND LEFT IT SORE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not be smooth
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide a smooth shave. Not worth it. The only reason I bought it was because it's a wet/dry. Their Satiny Smooth All-in-One Personal Groomer does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I had to throw this out because it did not charge after the first week. I kept plugging it in, but there was a short and the light did not go on to indicate it was charging. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: First time using electric
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand. First time using this type of product, have always uses the disposable razors. This was a gift from my daughter. Shave was close and no Nick's on dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Winifred Amos

customer_reviews.title: Loses Charge and Pulls Hair
customer_reviews.text: I would absolutely not buy this razor again. After about 6 months, it got so that the battery was very run down. I would charge it and then it would only last about 5 minutes. The next day when I went back to use it again, the charge was dead. Also it had trouble cutting thick hair and would pull at hair--very painful! The charging cord is so long that it wasn't practical to keep it out on my counter always charged too. The plastic has chipped and metal bent. I would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This literally worked for 3 weeks it won’t hold the charge and no longer works .
customer_reviews.author: jenesie boulos

customer_reviews.title: Battery seems to run out rather quick
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Battery seems to die after just 20 minutes of using it. I have an older one by conair as well that seems to hold the charge for an additional 20 minutes. Price is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: This was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: whoever thinks this shaver is satiny smooth has a perverted sense of judgment! This shaver is harsh and scratchy, the most uncomfortable shaver I ever had. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: rhaven

customer_reviews.title: Satiny Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this shaver for nearly a decade, it has been the same each time. For some reason I always end up breaking mine by accidentally dropping it on hard surface. Glad they haven't changed the way they make it. The only thing they have changed is the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mwoods

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews on this and there were a few that didn't like it, but I took a chance and ordered it. I absolutely love it. The shaver this replaced was over 10 years old. I have no negatives to write about. Very glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can it be used on arms and face?
customer_reviews.text: Can this razor be used on the arms and face? I bought it for that. May be my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Barr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to get this smooth of a shave on my bikini area with anything else - EVER! Excellent product and does exactly what it says it does! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lauram424

customer_reviews.title: Try this shaver--It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older shaver also made by Conair and it had worn out--while looking for replacement parts I saw this on Amazon and bought it...It's supposed to be good wet or dry. I haven't used it in the shower yet, but it gives a very close shave right AFTER a shower. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Conair does not honor warranties.
customer_reviews.text: I rated it this way because within one month the shaver was broken. I called the company and they keep saying on back order. Once in November they stated that a shipment was coming in and give them 10 days to process the order and I would be receiving my razor before the end on December. On the 30 or 31 I called wondering where my razor was and was told it is on Back order again. As far as I am concerned they do not honor their warranties. I wonder If you would help me get a new razor the same one or a different one all together. Thank you for your attention on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish the battery lasted longer, other then that it does a decent job for in between shaving
customer_reviews.author: Francy W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not as close a shave as with a razor.
customer_reviews.text: This shaver works as expected. It's great for a touch up before work. It doesn't get a close as a razor shave, but it's good. It feels like the evening after a razor shave... if that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: I looked everywhere for one like this. Yes it works great at hair on ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for one like this. Yes it works great at hair on the body. Love it. I no longer cut myself with razors.
customer_reviews.author: HelloItsMe

customer_reviews.title: For a quick touch up
customer_reviews.text: Okay for touch ups but not a close shave. You have to put a lot of pressure on the shaver to cut. No smooth finish more of a stubble finish and you would want to wear leggings not shorts or a skirt
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: This one gives the closest shave and never irritates my skin like most others do
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shaver for YEARS. I have tried many different ones, and yet I always come back to this one. This one gives the closest shave and never irritates my skin like most others do. I will continue to buy these shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Amy_Ro

customer_reviews.title: I was terribly disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I was terribly disappointed in this product. My mom used it for ONE month and it would no longer work. On April 23 I started to return the razor only to realize that Amazon would not accept it. I will be much more careful about buying items from Amazon in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Stepek

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great consistent product highly recommend it you can use it dry or wet
customer_reviews.author: Derrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the 4th use
customer_reviews.text: The first couple times I used this, it cut up my legs...this is probably the 5th time I used it and it just broke on me, and pieces went everywhere. Maybe this is why it is so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Not good! Didn't like it. I recommend you the flawless legs from as seen in TV. It's way better!
customer_reviews.author: Mari y Ker

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: THis is a great product at a very reasonable cost. I am very happy I listened to other reviewers and selected this one. The convenience it offers when having a small child and not being able to take those long enjoyable showers is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: mama has smooth legs
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom. She is on chemo and any nick or cut puts her at risk for infection so we got this little guy so she can have smooth legs for all the nursing staff that waits on her. She says it works well so I'll have to take her word on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Razor
customer_reviews.text: Hope this one lasts longer than then the same brand and style I had before. Bought another one just like it because my husband likes it. May 3, 2015 This one just died also. It is only a little over a year and half old. The charging unit just quit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All around good shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver. Easy to clean. Does a smooth, thorough job
customer_reviews.author: Joan M Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and used it for several years. When it wore out, I purchased another brand locally. It was totally unusable, so I ordered this Conair shaver exactly like my first one because I love it.
customer_reviews.author: El Grillo

customer_reviews.title: LOve it!
customer_reviews.text: I always have to have an electrical shaver and this one is good. It is not that noisy and it shaves somewhat close and closer if you take time to do it. Can't beat the price and the seller is good. Cleaning is good and it holds the charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TScott

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. If my chronic illness is zapping my energy, this really helps for a short cut!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Smith

product_meta.title: Conair Satiny Smooth Ladies Dual Foil Rechargeable Wet/Dry Shaver with Pop-up Trimmer, Purple/White
product_meta.description: Style:Cordless/RechargeableSay goodbye to stubble and unwanted hair and hello to soft, satiny smooth skin all over. The Conair Satiny Smooth Ladies Dual Foil Rechargeable Wet/Dry Shaver gives you smooth results on your legs as well as those hard-to-reach bikini area spots. This ladies electric shaver features dual independent floating cutters that work on both wet or dry skin and safely remove stubble. And new dual hypoallergenic foils offer less irritation and provide silky smooth results. Use this ladies personal trimmer in or out of the shower for your shaving and trimming convenience and comfort. This hair trimmer for women includes two full-width trimmers. One is a pop-up to provide the ultimate in precise close shaving for your bikini area and most sensitive areas. And the other is a full-width integrated trimmer that quickly and safely shaves longer hair for a closer shave. This ladies personal trimmer features a new ergonomic shape making it comfortable to hold and use for those hard-to-reach spots and all your shaving and trimming needs. Conveniently rechargeable, this ladies shaver comes with a charging stand and LED indicator light so you always know when it’s charging. The purple and white color of this ladies trimmer means it’s pretty enough to keep on your bathroom counter. We’ve also included a convenient cleaning brush so you can keep your shaver good as new after every use and free of hair and debris. Get beach and bikini ready with the Conair Satiny Smooth Ladies Dual Foil Rechargeable Wet/Dry Shaver.
feature_bullets: Twin independent floating cutters and dual hypoallergenic foils for less irritation
Full-width trimmers including pop-up for bikini-line
Floating trimmer for close, precise trimming
Wet/Dry for use in or out of the shower
Cordless and rechargeable; includes charging stand with indicator light

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
